full_text: ee a IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KER/OS7 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.71 OF 2020 (H) IN CONNECTION WITH THE ORDER OF THE COURT OF SESSIONS, ERNAKULAM IN Cri.M.P. NO. 3048/2019 IN Cr1.M.C.NO.2229/2019, DATED 16.12.2019 PETITIONERS /ACCUSED NO.1 TO 3: 1 UFRINE CADUTHUZ, AGED 51 YEARS, S/O.FREDDY CADUTHUZ, MANAPPURATH HOUSE, THOTTAKKATTURKKARA , ALUVA, ERNAKUALM. 2 FRANCILYN FERNANDEZ @ FRANCILYN DUROM, AGED 47 YEARS, W/O.JUSTIN JAMES FERNANDEZ, FAIRNESS COTTAGE, SRM ROAD, ERNAKULAM. 3 DELPHY JOSEPHINE MORERA @ DELPHI MORERA, AGED 44 YEARS W/O.ROLAND MORERA, MARY CHRIS VILLA, NEAR HEAD POST OFFICE, ALAPPUZHA. BY ADVS. SRI .K.R.VINOD SMT .M.S.LETHA KUM.K.S.SREEREKHA SRI.NABIL KHADER RESPONDENTS : 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, KOCHI- 682031. 2 K.J.ANTONY, AGED 55 YEARS, S/O.GEORGE, KODARAMPARAMBIL HOUSE, NETTOOR P.O., ERNAKULAM, PIN- 682040. OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl.MC.No.71 OF 2020 (H) 2020/KER/OS7 2 ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January, 2020 The petitioners were released on bail by the Sessions Court, Ernakulam on condition that they shall appear before the Investigating Officer on every Saturday between 9.00 a.m and 10.00 a.m. 2. Subsequently, the petitioners had approached this Court for quashing of the proceedings and vide order at Annexure A5, it was directed by this Court that the investigation could continue. But the final report has to be filed after seeking permission of this Court. 3. Subsequently, the petitioners had approached the Sessions Court for modification of the direction regarding the appearance before the Investigating Officer on every Saturday. The order was modified to the effect that they shall appear before the Investigating Officer on every second Saturday. That order at Annexure A-6 is challenged before this Court. Pape ies a Crl.MC.No.71 OF 2020 (H) 2020/KER/OS7 3 Considering the facts that the final report has to be filed only after getting permission of this Court, I find that the direction to appear before the Investigating Officer on every second Saturday is not very relevant and necessary. The petitioners shall appear before the Investigating Officer as and when called for. The impugned order is modified to that effect. The Crl.M.C is disposed of as above. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE NR/16/01/20 ee al Crl.MC.No.71 OF 2020 (H) 2020/KERI657 4 APPENDIX PETITIONERS' EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al THE COPY OF THE FIR NO.1229/2019 oF MARADU POLICE STATION.
